Classes
Class
Description
BackgroundMusicPlayer
A class to play the background music
BackListener
The custom MouseListener for the return to main menu button in the help panel
BuyCursorListener
The custom MouseListener for the Buy Cursor button
BuyFactoryListener
The custom MouseListener for the Buy Mine button
BuyFarmListener
The custom MouseListener for the Buy Farm button
BuyGrandmaListener
The custom MouseListener for the Buy Grandma button
BuyListener
The custom MouseListener for buy JButtons

The custom MouseListener for the Buy Mine button
CloseGameListener
The custom MouseListener for the close game button
CookieListener
The custom MouseListener for the cookie button
GameLoop
Game loop class to manage automatic cookies, etc
GamePanel
The game panel where the user will be able to play Cookie Clickers
HelpListener
The custom MouseListener for the help button
HelpPanel
The JPanel where the user will be able to view how to play
HomePanel
The first JPanel the user will see where there is an option to view settings, view how to play, and load data
LoadListener
The custom MouseListener for the load buttons
LoadPanel
The JPanel where the user will be able to load up or reset their data
Main
Main class where everything starts and is initialized.
MainFrame
The Main JFrame where the game will be displayed and managed
PlayListener
The custom MouseListener for the play button
ResetListener
The custom MouseListener class for reset buttons
SaveExitListener
The custom MouseListener for the Save and Exit button
SaveListener
The custom MouseListener for the Save button
SettingsButtonListener
The custom MouseListener for the settings button
SettingsPanel
The JPanel subclass for the settings page
StartListener
The MouseListener for the start button
TitlePanel
The title panel for the game
Utils
Utils class that has a bunch of methods to reduce repetition
VolumeChangeListener
The ChangeListener for when the user changes the volume
